title: Teach Me How
overview: Russel has wanted Jake for a long time. From the beginning, he fantasized about him, and his imagination is full of Jake. What will he do if fate brings them closer together and that will be the reason for him to get to know Jake better. When he meets the young man, what he finds out is a revelation...Will his view change? Will he completely forget Jake because of what he found out, or will he continue to get to know him more so that his dreams and imaginations become reality?
